# pimple
> This challenge is simple, it's just a pimple! 

```
file pimple
    GIMP XCF image data, version 011, 1024 x 1024, RGB Color
gimp pimple
```

![](https://i.imgur.com/jNOKBe7.jpg)

>flag{9a64bc4a390cb0ce31452820ee562c3f}

# Confidentiality
>My school was trying to teach people about the CIA triad so they made all these dumb example applications... as if they know anything about information security. Can you prove these aren't so secure? 

![](https://i.imgur.com/De3TWCH.png)
![](https://i.imgur.com/DMHPsOf.png)

by doing that i understood that its using ls -la so i had to exit it by | (pipe) 

![](https://i.imgur.com/ytQ8WAZ.png)

>flag{e56abbce7b83d62dac05e59fb1e81c68}
>
---

# Butter Overflow
>Can you overflow this right? 

```
./butter_overflow
    How many bytes does it take to overflow this buffer?
        
            Could not open flag file.
```

![](https://i.imgur.com/FIWIfBO.png)
so now i connected to the server to run it 
```
nc challenge.ctf.games 30054
    How many bytes does it take to overflow this buffer?
        
            flag{72d8784a5da3a8f56d2106c12dbab989}
```
>flag{72d8784a5da3a8f56d2106c12dbab989}
